name: Midea-Wi-Fi-CMI

”Alexa, turn on air conditioner”

skdetail:
Smart Home Skill. This skill may share device information with Amazon. Learn more.
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
des:
Midea-Wi-Fi-CMI skill lets you control your Midea AC compatible with Alexa through your voice

Midea-Wi-Fi-CMI skill offers the great experience of controlling of your Midea smart AC through your voice. To get started:
1. Download "Midea-Wi-Fi-CMI" App on android/IOS phone.
2. Register your account in the app.
3. Configure your device on Midea-Wi-Fi-CMI app by following app instructions and name your devices (rename is also possible).
4. Configure your ECHO device with Alexa app and search for the "Midea-Wi-Fi-CMI" skill.
5. Click "Enable Skill" of Midea-Wi-Fi-CMI.
6. Input your Midea-Wi-Fi-CMI app User ID & Password.
7. Talk to Echo "Alexa, discover devices". Wait till Echo says "Discover is completed".
8. Set up is completed. Try to talk to Alexa to control your devices.
Alexa, turn on Midea AC
Alexa, turn off Midea AC
Alexa, what temperature is Midea AC set to ?
Alexa, make Midea AC warmer
Alexa, make Midea AC cooler
Alexa, raise Midea AC
Alexa, lower Midea AC 2 degrees
Alexa, set Midea AC to auto
